title: Spaghetti Carbonara üçù
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper. Simple, creamy, and quick!
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, cook the pancetta in a skillet until crisp. Remove from heat.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, grated cheese, and a generous amount of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving some pasta water. Quickly toss hot pasta with pancetta and the egg mixture. The heat from the pasta will cook the eggs.
Add a splash of reserved pasta water if the sauce is too thick. Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala üçó
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth, buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy. A British-Indian favorite.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tandoori masala for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through.
In a separate pot, simmer crushed tomatoes with your preferred spices (ginger, garlic, garam masala).
Stir in the heavy cream and marinated chicken. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve hot with basmati rice or naan bread.
